job_history.role_name: Eighth, Ninth and Tenth English Teacher
job_history.work_description: Develop general knowledge of entire program's 8-10 curriculum and very detailed knowledge of courses for which responsible. Support students and parents with alternate strategies, provide additional assistance with daily assignments and projects. Communicate regularly with parents, students, guidance counselors, curriculum specialists through use of computer and telephone.

job_history.role_name: Seventh and Eighth Grade Reading Teacher and Department Chair
job_history.work_description: Performing to an exceptional standard in this position, where demonstrate skills and abilities earn promotion to position of Reading Department Chair. Utilizing expertise of curriculum to ensure the provision of an engaging, facilitative learning environment, efficiently managing the classroom with gifted and advanced reading students.

job_history.role_name: Seventh Grade Reading/ Language Arts Teacher
job_history.work_description: Adhering to tier 2 and tier 3 interventions in delivering flexible teaching practices to students, striving to ensure academic development of all students with differing abilities. Performing comprehensive assessments, evaluations of progress and goals of each student within the Title One education plan in order to provide detailed feedback to parents, administration staff, students.

job_history.role_name: Sixth Grade Reading and Language Arts Educator
job_history.work_description: Closely adhering to relevant guidelines and processes when preparing and applying a tailored lesson plan. Playing an instrumental role in a team of nine/ten colleagues in order to deliver an effective learning environment for students of all abilities.

job_history.role_name: Ninth and Eleventh Grade Reading and Language Arts Educator
job_history.work_description: Striving to ensure the academic success of all students by providing rigorous lessons for students.

education.domain: Liberal Studies English Writing and Multi-Cultural Anthropology

skills.name: Teaching
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience teaching various grade levels and subjects, including reading, language arts, and English, demonstrating expert-level mastery.

skills.explanation: Utilized expertise of curriculum to ensure the provision of an engaging, facilitative learning environment, suggesting strong proficiency in curriculum development.

skills.name: Classroom Management

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Communicated regularly with parents, students, guidance counselors, and curriculum specialists, suggesting strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Earned promotion to position of Reading Department Chair, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Assessment and Evaluation
skills.explanation: Performed comprehensive assessments, evaluations of progress and goals of each student, suggesting strong proficiency in assessment and evaluation.
